targets.expr:
{job="gnmic-state"} 
|~ "srrp.*oper-state" 
| json bngRouter="source"
| bngRouter=~".*bng1.*"
| json operState=`updates[0].values["oper-state"]`
| label_format BNG1_OperState="{{.bngRouter}} {{.operState}}"

{job="gnmic-state"} 
|~ "srrp.*oper-state" 
| json bngRouter="source"
| bngRouter=~".*bng2.*"
| json operState=`updates[0].values["oper-state"]`
| label_format BNG2_OperState="{{.bngRouter}} {{.operState}}"

panels.title: Number of current IPv4 / IPv6 hosts

names: {application="TMNX", detected_level="critical", facility="local7", job="syslog", level="critical", service_name="TMNX", source="172.18.0.1"}
